entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 1:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Rain at times heavy beginning before morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
